mapper.insert: insert into reserve_cart(memberId, lodgingId, lodgingCount) values(#{memberId}, #{lodgingId}, #{lodgingCount})
mapper.update: update reserve_cart set lodgingCount=#{lodgingCount} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: select * from reserve_cart where memberId = #{memberId} and lodgingId = #{lodgingId}
mapper.delete: delete from reserve_cart where memberId = #{memberId} and lodgingId = #{lodgingId}
